cards.rules_text:
Flash
When Agent of Deception enters, counter target creature or planeswalker spell unless its controller pays {X}, where X is your devotion to blue.(Each {U} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to blue.)

At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, that player may pay life equal to the number of pain counters they have plus 1. If they don't, look at their hand, choose a card from it, and exile that card. If they do, that player gets a pain counter.
You may cast cards exiled with Alehana, and mana of any type can be spent to cast them.

At the beginning of combat on your turn, if there are seven or more loyalty counters on Ameret, they become a 5/5 Angel creature with flying and indestructible until end of turn.
[+1]: Create a 1/1 red and white Cleric creature token with lifelink and haste.
[-X]: Ameret deals X damage to any target. You gain X life.

Whenever you scry, put a loyalty counter on Amos, Rune-Mage.
[+1]: Create a Glyph token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, Sacrifice this: Scry 1.")
[-1]: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
[-5]: Draw three cards.

Menace
When Anigul, the Setting Sun enters, each opponent discards a card.
Whenever Anigul deals combat damage to an opponent, exile up to two target cards from that player's graveyard. For each card exiled in this way, Anigul deals 1 damage to that card's owner.

When Ardent Ascetic enters, draw a card.
You may play an additional land on each of your turns.

Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. You gain 2 life.
Invoke {X}{G}{U} ({X}{G}{U}: Put this from your graveyard onto the battlefield transformed. If you don't control a Totem, first create a 0/0 colorless Totem creature token. Invoke only as a sorcery.)

cards.rules_text:
Vigilance
Drop - Whenever Avatar of the Festival or another creature you control enters, if the entering creature was cast and you didn't cast any creature spells during your last turn, you may have your life total become the total power and toughness of creatures you control.

This spell costs {1} less to cast if there is a card named Avert Disaster or Imminent Disaster in your graveyard.
Counter target spell.

As Bind in Silence enters, choose a nonland card name.
Spells with the chosen name can't be cast.
When Bind in Silence is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, your opponents can't cast spells this turn.

All spells cost {1} more to cast.
Spellcharge 6 (At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you've spent at least six mana to cast spells this turn, you may have this become an artifact creature until end of turn.)

When Casus Belli enters, exile up to one target creature or planeswalker until Casus Belli leaves the battlefield.
Creatures you control get +1/+0.

Chromatic Dragon is all colors.

{1}: Chromatic Dragon gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Mill five cards. When you do, you may return a creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

Noncreature, non-Equipment spells cost {1} more to cast for each permanent attached to Codename: Viridian.

{T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Add one mana of any type.
Once each turn, when you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may create a 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature token.

Whenever Dawnglade Wildbear deals combat damage to a player, return a permanent you control to its owner's hand.

Whenever you cast a black spell or an artifact spell, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Whenever you cast a nonblack, nonartifact spell, you lose 1 life.

Whenever a creature you control attacks, you may exile a number of cards from your graveyard equal to its power. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

Look at the top six cards of your library. You may put a creature card with mana value 3 or less from among them onto the battlefield. It enters with an additional +1/+1 counter on it. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
Cycling {R/G} ({R/G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

Whenever Forgotten Cultivator attacks, mill three cards. Return a permanent card from among the milled cards to your hand.

If you would draw one or more cards, you may instead put a night counter on Lunar Vigil and draw that many cards minus one.

Whenever Merciless Shieldbreaker enters or attacks, target opponent puts three rust counters on a permanent they control with no rust counters on it. {1}{U}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

[0]: Target creature you control gets +2/+2 and gains lifelink until your next turn.

[-3]: You and target opponent's life totals each become equal to half your combined life totals, rounded down.
